page.title: 13The Strawberry Pickers.
page.content: On the second of July I interviewed Mrs. Careless and Mrs.Dawe who work six hours casual labour picking strawberries.Mrs.Careless can pick about eighty pounds in a day .She doesn't get paid piece work.Six other people work with them.None of the workers work on Friday because there is no market.They also pick potatoes leeks,spring onions,cucumbers,sprouts and small carrots depending on the season.The growers sell the strawberries etc.at market and at the farm shops.They keep the strawberries in cold storage.They spray the strawberries before they are picked. The strawberry season lasts three to four weeks.The strawberries have a strong scent.The ladies eat the odd strawberry now and then,and when the ladies get home they can't sit down because they get back ache.
